lattice

Class Permutation

  • java.lang.Object
    • lattice.Permutation

  • public class Permutation
extends java.lang.Object

    This class provides a representation of permutations.

    If this component transforms : 0 -> 1, 1 -> 0 & 2 -> 2. Then its length is 3 and

    The content contains :

    content[0]=1
content[1]=0
content[2]=2

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      Permutation(int n)
      Constructs identity of the set 0..n-1.
